name: sitemap_get_sitemap_tree
description: Fetch and parse the sitemap tree from a website URL

url.description: The URL of the website homepage (e.g., https://example.com)
url.title: Url

include_pages.description: Whether to include page details in the response
include_pages.title: Include Pages

name: sitemap_get_sitemap_pages
description: Get all pages from a website's sitemap with optional limits and filtering options. Supports cursor-based pagination.

url.description: The URL of the website homepage (e.g., https://example.com)
url.title: Url

limit.description: Maximum number of pages to return per page (0 for default of 100)
limit.title: Limit

include_metadata.description: Whether to include additional page metadata (priority, lastmod, etc.)
include_metadata.title: Include Metadata

route.description: Optional route path to filter pages by (e.g., '/blog')
route.title: Route

sitemap_url.description: Optional URL of a specific sitemap to get pages from
sitemap_url.title: Sitemap Url

cursor.description: Pagination cursor for fetching the next page of results
cursor.title: Cursor

name: sitemap_get_sitemap_stats
description: Get comprehensive statistics about a website's sitemap structure

url.description: The URL of the website homepage (e.g., https://example.com)
url.title: Url

name: sitemap_parse_sitemap_content
description: Parse a sitemap directly from its XML or text content

content.description: The content of the sitemap (XML, text, etc.)
content.title: Content

include_pages.description: Whether to include page details in the response
include_pages.title: Include Pages
